text: I recently engaged MLTM Design and the quality and attention to details have been exceptional. Even other designers have commented on the good sense in furniture placement and design. Most of all, Michelle has been updating me regularly leaving no surprises. The delivery of work is on time and beyond my expectation. Her patience is most commendable. There is no doubt i will engage her services in future.

Was looking forward when I engaged MLTM Design but the experience was deeply disappointing. The quality of workmanship was subpar, with numerous issues that indicated a lack of attention to detail. Over time, the workmanship deteriorated more with the designer being unable to rectify. Strongly discourage from engaging them, and my experience left me regretting.
Michelle has been extremely patient and accommodating to our last minute request and always give her great aesthetic and practical professional recommendations. 5 star !
Michelle was professional and helpful, responsive even when I wanted to make revisions. The work was good quality, and efficient.
